5479.verse: أَوْ|Or|41|50|154$زِدْ|add|47|65|17466$عَلَيْهِ|to it,|64|82|395$وَرَتِّلِ|and recite|87|105|17467$ٱلْقُرْءَانَ|the Quran|95|113|4239$تَرْتِيلاً|(with) measured rhythmic recitation.|263|272|12765$

5481.verse: إِنَّ|Indeed,|70|85|58$نَاشِئَةَ|(the) rising|93|124|17469$ٱلَّيْلِ|(at) the night,|116|147|1418$هِىَ|it|53|84|665$أَشَدُّ|(is) very hard|110|141|711$وَطْــًٔا|and most potent|130|145|17470$وَأَقْوَمُ|and more suitable|137|364|2551$قِيلاً|(for) Word.|94|321|4487$

5483.verse: وَٱذْكُرِ|And remember|114|138|17473$ٱسْمَ|(the) name|94|142|4761$رَبِّكَ|(of) your Lord|112|160|1322$وَتَبَتَّلْ|and devote yourself|152|200|17474$إِلَيْهِ|to Him|62|86|296$تَبْتِيلاً|(with) devotion.|127|127|17475$

5486.verse: وَذَرْنِى|And leave Me|109|122|17479$وَٱلْمُكَذِّبِينَ|and the deniers,|128|153|17480$أُوْلِى|possessors|92|117|4344$ٱلنَّعْمَةِ|(of) the ease,|113|138|17481$وَمَهِّلْهُمْ|and allow them respite -|182|195|17482$قَلِيلاً|a little.|67|67|433$

5489.verse: يَوْمَ|On (the) Day|107|128|1057$تَرْجُفُ|will quake|86|128|17488$ٱلْأَرْضُ|the earth|92|134|589$وَٱلْجِبَالُ|and the mountains,|148|190|12014$وَكَانَتِ|and will become|125|146|11082$ٱلْجِبَالُ|the mountains|114|196|9461$كَثِيبًا|a heap of sand|119|284|17489$مَّهِيلاً|pouring down.|113|195|17490$

5491.verse: فَعَصَىٰ|But disobeyed|113|130|17491$فِرْعَوْنُ|Firaun|93|128|6705$ٱلرَّسُولَ|the Messenger,|122|157|1284$فَأَخَذْنَـٰهُ|so We seized him|134|169|13461$أَخْذًا|(with) a seizure|124|141|17492$وَبِيلاً|ruinous.|72|72|17493$

5492.verse: فَكَيْفَ|Then how|85|95|2727$تَتَّقُونَ|will you guard yourselves,|191|211|194$إِن|if|44|64|225$كَفَرْتُمْ|you disbelieve,|118|138|7710$يَوْمًا|a Day|62|82|468$يَجْعَلُ|(that) will make|124|134|6008$ٱلْوِلْدَٲنَ|the children|98|331|17494$شِيبًا|gray-headed?|111|344|17495$

5493.verse: ٱلسَّمَآءُ|The heaven|98|107|12745$مُنفَطِرُۢ|(will) break apart|133|152|17496$بِهِۦ‌ۚ|therefrom,|89|108|204$كَانَ|is|57|76|913$وَعْدُهُۥ|His Promise|94|113|11246$مَفْعُولاً|to be fulfilled.|111|120|4060$

5476.verse: O you who wraps himself [in clothing],

5477.verse: Arise [to pray] the night, except for a little -

5478.verse: Half of it - or subtract from it a little

5479.verse: Or add to it, and recite the Qur'an with measured recitation.

5480.verse: Indeed, We will cast upon you a heavy word.

5481.verse: Indeed, the hours of the night are more effective for concurrence [of heart and tongue] and more suitable for words.

5482.verse: Indeed, for you by day is prolonged occupation.

5483.verse: And remember the name of your Lord and devote yourself to Him with [complete] devotion.

5484.verse: [He is] the Lord of the East and the West; there is no deity except Him, so take Him as Disposer of [your] affairs.

5485.verse: And be patient over what they say and avoid them with gracious avoidance.

5486.verse: And leave Me with [the matter of] the deniers, those of ease [in life], and allow them respite a little.

5487.verse: Indeed, with Us [for them] are shackles and burning fire

5488.verse: And food that chokes and a painful punishment -

5489.verse: On the Day the earth and the mountains will convulse and the mountains will become a heap of sand pouring down.

5490.verse: Indeed, We have sent to you a Messenger as a witness upon you just as We sent to Pharaoh a messenger.

5491.verse: But Pharaoh disobeyed the messenger, so We seized him with a ruinous seizure.

5492.verse: Then how can you fear, if you disbelieve, a Day that will make the children white- haired?

5493.verse: The heaven will break apart therefrom; ever is His promise fulfilled.

5494.verse: Indeed, this is a reminder, so whoever wills may take to his Lord a way.
